original_text: So the army went out into the field against Israel, and the battle was fought in the forest of Ephraim.
korean_text: 이에 백성이 이스라엘을 치러 들로 나가서 에브라임 수풀에서 싸우더니

sentences.original_text: So the army went out into the field against Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 군대는 이스라엘을 대항하여 들로 나갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the battle was fought in the forest of Ephraim.
